welcome_message.en: Welcome to NomaApp. Help farmers diagnose crop issues.
welcome_message.ha: Barka da zuwa NomaApp. Muna taimakawa manoma gano matsalolin amfanin gona.

non_chemical_steps.ha: Fara da waɗannan matakan ba na sinadarai ba:

spray_instruction.en: If spraying: use the recommended dose and wear PPE.
spray_instruction.ha: Idan za a feshe: yi amfani da kwayar da aka ba da shawara kuma sanya kayan kariya.

safety_warning.en: Warning: follow PHI and REI; keep away from water sources.
safety_warning.ha: Gargaɗi: bi PHI da REI; ka nisanci wuraren ruwa.

follow_up_reminder.en: We will remind you in {days} days to recheck.
follow_up_reminder.ha: Za mu tunatar da ku a cikin kwanaki {days} don sake duba.
